# The `PhysRegInfo` Struct Reference

## Description {#details}

Information about how a physical register Reg is used by a set of operands.

Definition at line 253 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h">MachineInstrBundle.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Attributes

### Clobbered {#a95ccd638d9c95907aa2977b6995a5862}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::PhysRegInfo::Clobbered">
There is a regmask operand indicating Reg is clobbered.

<SectionUser title="See Also">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a4c01d756ca363aef75429d61d21c0c14">MachineOperand::CreateRegMask()</a>.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h/#l00256">256</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h">MachineInstrBundle.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### DeadDef {#a29a3b50ebfd83bdd194cd94b278f98ef}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::PhysRegInfo::DeadDef">
Either:

<ul>
<li>Reg is FullyDefined and all defs of reg or an overlapping register are dead, or</li>
<li>Reg is completely dead because &quot;defined&quot; by a clobber.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h/#l00275">275</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h">MachineInstrBundle.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Defined {#a428577f7fc3e0cdd5d6462e8be6594ce}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::PhysRegInfo::Defined">
Reg or one of its aliases is defined.

The definition may only cover parts of the register.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h/#l00260">260</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h">MachineInstrBundle.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### FullyDefined {#afd963decf92bbfc81110071b5a39e9f4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::PhysRegInfo::FullyDefined">
Reg or a super-register is defined.

The definition covers the full register.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h/#l00263">263</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h">MachineInstrBundle.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### FullyRead {#ab0edced3ebd6eab4bb97ca7a54da143e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::PhysRegInfo::FullyRead">
Reg or a super-register is read. The full register is read.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h/#l00269">269</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h">MachineInstrBundle.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Killed {#a56707cfc519c951f00898865f056bd5d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::PhysRegInfo::Killed">
There is a use operand of reg or a super-register with kill flag set.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h/#l00282">282</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h">MachineInstrBundle.h</a>.

### PartialDeadDef {#a638357f2d1f0d544b0e98e0fc38193f8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::PhysRegInfo::PartialDeadDef">
Reg is Defined and all defs of reg or an overlapping register are dead.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h/#l00279">279</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h">MachineInstrBundle.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Read {#a1e015cecd2b05bcfd79e0315a146f57b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::PhysRegInfo::Read">
Reg or one of its aliases is read.

The register may only be read partially.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h/#l00267">267</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h">MachineInstrBundle.h</a>.
